title: KubeCon Europe: Kubernetes vNode, From the Makers of vCluster
author: Joab Jackson
description: LoftLabs' new vNode lightweight runtime isolates individual Kubernetes nodes for both improved multitenancy security and resource efficiency.
cntitle: KubeCon 欧洲：Kubernetes vNode，来自 vCluster 的创造者
cndescription: LoftLabs 的新 vNode 轻量级运行时隔离了各个 Kubernetes 节点，从而提高了多租户安全性和资源效率。
